alert.note: Alert for Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 09 at 7:14PM CDT until August 09 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CRAIG...NORTHEASTERN ROGERS AND NORTHWESTERN MAYES COUNTIES... At 714 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Chelsea, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Chelsea... Adair... Foyil... Big Cabin... Bushyhead... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 260 and 276. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
